message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000.  It's a fair price considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to go down to $1,100,000.  That's still a great deal for you, considering the value you've placed on the product. Let's find some common ground!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,075,000. That's the lowest I can go.
